item.title: Piano Notebook
item.description: This is a running notebook about piano. Chords G7 chord is a four note chords with G-B-D-F.

item.title: Git Notebook
item.description: 1 Why should we care about Version Control? 1.1 Git with RStudio and GitLab 2 Core Git Commands and Workflow in Git Shell 2.1 Two basic commands: git pull and git push. 2.2 4-step common workflow in Git 1 Why should we care about Version Control? When writing up a paper with multiple collaborators, we want to avoid the following situation: 1.1 Git with RStudio and GitLab The essential video to connect Git with Rstudio can be found here.

item.title: R Notebook
item.description: 1 R Setup 101 1.1 R Packages for Basic R Installation or Update 1.2 Read SAS sas7bdat data into R 1.2.1 Use library sas7bdat in R 1.2.2 Use library haven package in R 1.2.3 Load Data files in R Studio 2 Create a Website using RMarkdown 2.1 RMarkdown, Hugo, Netlify 2.2 Blogdown & Hugo - Fix ToC (with Rmd) 3 Write a Reproducible Paper using RMarkdown 3.

item.title: Statistical Learning
item.description: 1 Little Statistical Learning Book 1.1 Model Representation: a function \(h : X → Y\) 1.2 Linear Algebra Review 2 ML Resources 2.1 Superb Online Courses and Books 2.2 Other Resources 1 Little Statistical Learning Book 1.1 Model Representation: a function \(h : X → Y\) This function \(h\) is called a hypothesis. Accuracy of our hypothesis function \(h\) is measured using a cost/loss function.

item.title: SAS Notebook
item.description: 1 My Little SAS Book 1.1 Using PROC SORT to remove duplicates 1.2 Input() and put() for variable type conversion 1.3 Merging/Stacking Datasets – Truncated Values 1 My Little SAS Book The aim is to document code chunks that are likely to be re-used for fast searching and indexing. 1.1 Using PROC SORT to remove duplicates There are three options that might be helpful: DUPOUT=, NODUPRECS, and NODUPKEYS.
